subject: Football
Sports Injuries
Concussions
Children and Childhood
lead_paragraph: Pop Warner has tried to protect young players from head injuries. Yet on any given Saturday, the rules may be bent or ignored, even by referees under pressure from parents and coaches.
snippet: Pop Warner has tried to protect young players from head injuries. Yet on any given Saturday, the rules may be bent or ignored, even by referees under pressure from parents and coaches.
